About me

  • 13. April, 1995

    Birth

    I was born in Trbovlje to two loving parents. We were living in suburban area near city. After two years my brother had been born.

  • 1. October, 2014

    Studying Mechatronics

    I chose to study in Maribor, even though I have never visited it before. It turned out great, because I fell in love with it.

  • 12. September, 2019

    Graduating

    After a long time of enjoying as a student this date for me is wake up call to think about what I want to do.

  • 31. March, 2020

    Lost a job

    I was working as a maintenance electrician in Paloma for 8 months, but I got laid off. This was the best thing that has happened to me. I took my time to find, what I enjoy to do.

My past projects

  • Transformer trening klub
  • Easybank website
  • Countries app

Transformer trening klub - fictional website

In this project I made a website for a gym from scratch. First I did a design in Adobe XD, then it was translated to code. I made sure that the website is responsive and accessible.

    Things that I have learned:
  • Using Adobe XD
  • Making FaQ
  • Making testimonials

See site live (opens in new window)

Easybank website - template from Frontendmentor

The style of this website is from Frontendmentor. I coded it together, so that it is functional and mobile responsive.

    Things that I have learned:
  • Making hamburger menu
  • Learning to position background images

See site live (opens in new window)

Countries app

For this project I have used API. Of all data that was fetched, in the main menu you can search for countries, filter them by region and click on selected country for more information.

    Things that I have learned:
  • How to fetch API
  • Filter data
  • Search data
  • Show data in modal

See site live (opens in new window)
